00019 const char SpectrumSolverWrapper::SPECTRUM_SOLVER_ZF_FFT[] = "ZF-FFT";
00020 const char SpectrumSolverWrapper::SPECTRUM_SOLVER_MEM_STRICT[] = "Strict MEM";
00021 const char SpectrumSolverWrapper::SPECTRUM_SOLVER_MEM_STRICT_EV[] = "EV+Strict MEM";
00022 const char SpectrumSolverWrapper::SPECTRUM_SOLVER_MEM_STRICT_BURG[] = "Burg+Strict MEM";
00023 const char SpectrumSolverWrapper::SPECTRUM_SOLVER_MEM_BURG_AICc[] = "Burg's MEM AICc";
00024 const char SpectrumSolverWrapper::SPECTRUM_SOLVER_MEM_BURG_MDL[] = "Burg's MEM MDL";
00025 const char SpectrumSolverWrapper::SPECTRUM_SOLVER_AR_YW_AICc[] = "Yule-Walker AR AICc";
00026 const char SpectrumSolverWrapper::SPECTRUM_SOLVER_AR_YW_MDL[] = "Yule-Walker AR MDL";
00027 const char SpectrumSolverWrapper::SPECTRUM_SOLVER_MUSIC_AIC[] = "MUSIC AIC";
00028 const char SpectrumSolverWrapper::SPECTRUM_SOLVER_MUSIC_MDL[] = "MUSIC MDL";
00029 const char SpectrumSolverWrapper::SPECTRUM_SOLVER_EV_AIC[] = "Eigenvector AIC";
00030 const char SpectrumSolverWrapper::SPECTRUM_SOLVER_EV_MDL[] = "Eigenvector MDL";
00031 const char SpectrumSolverWrapper::SPECTRUM_SOLVER_MVDL[] = "Capon's MVDL(MLM)";
00032 const char SpectrumSolverWrapper::SPECTRUM_SOLVER_LS_AICc[] = "LeastSquare AICc";
00033 const char SpectrumSolverWrapper::SPECTRUM_SOLVER_LS_MDL[] = "LeastSquare MDL";
00034 
00035 const char SpectrumSolverWrapper::WINDOW_FUNC_DEFAULT[] = "Rect";
00036 const char SpectrumSolverWrapper::WINDOW_FUNC_HANNING[] = "Hanning";
00037 const char SpectrumSolverWrapper::WINDOW_FUNC_HAMMING[] = "Hamming";
00038 const char SpectrumSolverWrapper::WINDOW_FUNC_FLATTOP[] = "Flat-Top";
00039 const char SpectrumSolverWrapper::WINDOW_FUNC_BLACKMAN[] = "Blackman";
00040 const char SpectrumSolverWrapper::WINDOW_FUNC_BLACKMAN_HARRIS[] = "Blackman-Harris";
00041 const char SpectrumSolverWrapper::WINDOW_FUNC_KAISER_1[] = "Kaiser a=3";
00042 const char SpectrumSolverWrapper::WINDOW_FUNC_KAISER_2[] = "Kaiser a=7.2";
00043 const char SpectrumSolverWrapper::WINDOW_FUNC_KAISER_3[] = "Kaiser a=15";
00044 
00045 SpectrumSolverWrapper::SpectrumSolverWrapper(const char *name, bool runtime,
00046     const shared_ptr<XComboNode> selector, const shared_ptr<XComboNode> windowfunc,
00047     const shared_ptr<XDoubleNode> windowlength)
00048     : XNode(name, runtime), m_selector(selector), m_windowfunc(windowfunc), m_windowlength(windowlength) {
00049     if(windowfunc) {
00050         windowfunc->add(WINDOW_FUNC_DEFAULT);
00051         windowfunc->add(WINDOW_FUNC_HANNING);
00052         windowfunc->add(WINDOW_FUNC_HAMMING);
00053         windowfunc->add(WINDOW_FUNC_BLACKMAN);
00054         windowfunc->add(WINDOW_FUNC_BLACKMAN_HARRIS);
00055         windowfunc->add(WINDOW_FUNC_FLATTOP);
00056         windowfunc->add(WINDOW_FUNC_KAISER_1);
00057         windowfunc->add(WINDOW_FUNC_KAISER_2);
00058         windowfunc->add(WINDOW_FUNC_KAISER_3);
00059     }
00060     if(selector) {
00061         selector->add(SPECTRUM_SOLVER_ZF_FFT);
00062         selector->add(SPECTRUM_SOLVER_MEM_STRICT);
00063 //      selector->add(SPECTRUM_SOLVER_MEM_STRICT_EV);
00064         selector->add(SPECTRUM_SOLVER_LS_AICc);
00065         selector->add(SPECTRUM_SOLVER_LS_MDL);
00066         selector->add(SPECTRUM_SOLVER_MVDL);
00067         selector->add(SPECTRUM_SOLVER_EV_MDL);
00068         selector->add(SPECTRUM_SOLVER_MUSIC_MDL);
00069         selector->add(SPECTRUM_SOLVER_MEM_BURG_AICc);
00070         selector->add(SPECTRUM_SOLVER_MEM_BURG_MDL);
00071         selector->add(SPECTRUM_SOLVER_AR_YW_AICc);
00072         selector->add(SPECTRUM_SOLVER_AR_YW_MDL);
00073 //      selector->add(SPECTRUM_SOLVER_MEM_STRICT_BURG);
00074         m_lsnOnChanged = selector->onValueChanged().connectWeak(shared_from_this(), &SpectrumSolverWrapper::onSolverChanged);
00075     }
00076     onSolverChanged(selector);
00077 }
00078 SpectrumSolverWrapper::~SpectrumSolverWrapper() {
00079     if(m_windowfunc) {
00080         m_windowfunc->clear();
00081     }
00082     if(m_selector) {
00083         m_selector->clear();
00084     }
00085 }
00086 FFT::twindowfunc
00087 SpectrumSolverWrapper::windowFunc() const {
00088     FFT::twindowfunc func = &FFT::windowFuncRect;
00089     if(m_windowfunc) {
00090         if(m_windowfunc->to_str() == WINDOW_FUNC_HANNING) func = &FFT::windowFuncHanning;
00091         if(m_windowfunc->to_str() == WINDOW_FUNC_HAMMING) func = &FFT::windowFuncHamming;
00092         if(m_windowfunc->to_str() == WINDOW_FUNC_FLATTOP) func = &FFT::windowFuncFlatTop;
00093         if(m_windowfunc->to_str() == WINDOW_FUNC_BLACKMAN) func = &FFT::windowFuncBlackman;
00094         if(m_windowfunc->to_str() == WINDOW_FUNC_BLACKMAN_HARRIS) func = &FFT::windowFuncBlackmanHarris;
00095         if(m_windowfunc->to_str() == WINDOW_FUNC_KAISER_1) func = &FFT::windowFuncKaiser1;
00096         if(m_windowfunc->to_str() == WINDOW_FUNC_KAISER_2) func = &FFT::windowFuncKaiser2;
00097         if(m_windowfunc->to_str() == WINDOW_FUNC_KAISER_3) func = &FFT::windowFuncKaiser3;
00098     }
00099     return func;
00100 }
00101 void
00102 SpectrumSolverWrapper::windowFuncs(std::deque<FFT::twindowfunc> &funcs) const {
00103     funcs.clear();
00104     funcs.push_back(&FFT::windowFuncRect);
00105     funcs.push_back(&FFT::windowFuncHanning);
00106     funcs.push_back(&FFT::windowFuncHamming);
00107     funcs.push_back(&FFT::windowFuncFlatTop);
00108     funcs.push_back(&FFT::windowFuncBlackman);
00109     funcs.push_back(&FFT::windowFuncBlackmanHarris);
00110     funcs.push_back(&FFT::windowFuncKaiser1);
00111     funcs.push_back(&FFT::windowFuncKaiser2);
00112     funcs.push_back(&FFT::windowFuncKaiser3);
00113 }
00114 
00115 void
00116 SpectrumSolverWrapper::onSolverChanged(const shared_ptr<XValueNodeBase> &) {
00117     shared_ptr<SpectrumSolver> solver;
00118     bool has_window = true;
00119     bool has_length = true;
00120     if(m_selector) {
00121         if(m_selector->to_str() == SPECTRUM_SOLVER_MEM_BURG_AICc) {
00122             solver.reset(new MEMBurg(&SpectrumSolver::icAICc));
00123         }
00124         if(m_selector->to_str() == SPECTRUM_SOLVER_MEM_BURG_MDL) {
00125             solver.reset(new MEMBurg(&SpectrumSolver::icMDL));
00126         }
00127         if(m_selector->to_str() == SPECTRUM_SOLVER_AR_YW_AICc) {
00128             solver.reset(new YuleWalkerAR(&SpectrumSolver::icAICc));
00129         }
00130         if(m_selector->to_str() == SPECTRUM_SOLVER_AR_YW_MDL) {
00131             solver.reset(new YuleWalkerAR(&SpectrumSolver::icMDL));
00132         }
00133         if(m_selector->to_str() == SPECTRUM_SOLVER_MUSIC_AIC) {
00134             solver.reset(new MUSIC(&SpectrumSolver::icAIC));
00135         }
00136         if(m_selector->to_str() == SPECTRUM_SOLVER_MUSIC_MDL) {
00137             solver.reset(new MUSIC(&SpectrumSolver::icMDL));
00138         }
00139         if(m_selector->to_str() == SPECTRUM_SOLVER_EV_AIC) {
00140             solver.reset(new EigenVectorMethod(&SpectrumSolver::icAIC));
00141         }
00142         if(m_selector->to_str() == SPECTRUM_SOLVER_EV_MDL) {
00143             solver.reset(new EigenVectorMethod(&SpectrumSolver::icMDL));
00144         }
00145         if(m_selector->to_str() == SPECTRUM_SOLVER_MVDL) {
00146             solver.reset(new MVDL);
00147         }
00148         if(m_selector->to_str() == SPECTRUM_SOLVER_MEM_STRICT) {
00149             solver.reset(new MEMStrict);
00150         }
00151         if(m_selector->to_str() == SPECTRUM_SOLVER_MEM_STRICT_EV) {
00152             solver.reset(new CompositeSpectrumSolver<MEMStrict, EigenVectorMethod>());
00153         }
00154         if(m_selector->to_str() == SPECTRUM_SOLVER_MEM_STRICT_BURG) {
00155             solver.reset(new CompositeSpectrumSolver<MEMStrict, MEMBurg>());
00156         }
00157         if(m_selector->to_str() == SPECTRUM_SOLVER_LS_AICc) {
00158             solver.reset(new FreqEstLeastSquare(&SpectrumSolver::icAICc));
00159         }
00160         if(m_selector->to_str() == SPECTRUM_SOLVER_LS_MDL) {
00161             solver.reset(new FreqEstLeastSquare(&SpectrumSolver::icMDL));
00162         }
00163     }
00164     if(!solver) {
00165         solver.reset(new FFTSolver);
00166     }
00167     if(m_windowfunc)
00168         m_windowfunc->setUIEnabled(has_window);
00169     if(m_windowlength)
00170         m_windowlength->setUIEnabled(has_length);
00171     m_solver = solver;  
00172 }
